invalid_lang: invalid lang, please type the 2 first letters of the language you want to choose
chan_added: channel '${this.w}' has been added to the settings
chan_created: channel '${this.w}' has been created and added to the settings
invalid_chan: channel '${this.w}' doesn't exists and can't be created
langPrompt:
please select the bot language between theses:
en(glish), fr(an√ßais)
prefixPrompt:
choose the prefix for calling the bot
ex: 'py'
adminRolePrompt:
type the roles that will have the rights to modify the bot settings
 separate them with ','. ex: 'adminInChief, moderatorSquad'
please don't put ',' characters in your roles names!
modRolePrompt:
type the roles that will be moderators in your voice channel
 separate them with ','. ex: 'adminInChief, moderatorSquad'
please don't put ',' characters in your roles names!
vocChanPrompt:
type the name of the voice chan where you want the bot to be active
 ex: '#vocalDebate'
botChanPrompt:
type the name of the chan where the bot will send messages, like the waitlist
 the channel will be created if it doesn't exist yet
 ex: 'debate_bot'
rateSpeakerPrompt:
do you want to allow the public to review a speaker after his speech? 
y(es) or n(o)
topSpeakerPrompt:
do you want a command showing the list of the most active speakers of your server?
y(es) or n(o)
endedInit: the configuration is now finished, you can use the bot!
command_admin_reserved: command '${this.w}' is reserved to bot admins
